description._content: Bain News Service,, publisher. Meeting Natl B.B. Commission [between ca. 1910 and ca. 1915] 1 negative : glass ; 5 x 7 in. or smaller. Notes: Title from unverified data provided by the Bain News Service on the negatives or caption cards. Forms part of: George Grantham Bain Collection (Library of Congress). Format: Glass negatives. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print General information about the Bain Collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.ggbain Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ggbain.11534 Call Number: LC-B2- 2517-14

note._content: August "Garry" Hermann, owner of the Cincinnati Reds baseball team, and Chairman of the National Base Ball Commission.
note.author: 70251312@N00

note._content: Date on Bain's sticker appears to be 9/18/12.
note.author: 70251312@N00

note._content: Members present appear to be deciding sundry weighty matters by dropping ballots into various straw hats. After being pulled from a hat and tabulated, the ballot is crumpled to indicate that it has been counted already. Mr. Hermann appears pleased that the ballot count has cinched his re-election as chairman for another year.
note.author: 70251312@N00
